sub_title: Industry Sales Manager at Caterpillar Inc.
summary:
Over ten years of international experience in Sales & Marketing and Dealer Development in Capital Goods/ Construction Industries. 
• Highly competent in Business Development and Distribution Channel Development. 
• A broad operational knowledge base within General Management, Dealer Development, Sales & Marketing Operations, Business Development, Territory Management and Product Support (Parts & Service), with a strong technical background.
• Extensive international experience.

Specialties: Strategic Marketing, Channel development strategy, Dealer Development, Sales Development, Marketing & Promotion strategies, Brand strategy, P&L management, Supply Chain management, Business Development, Change management, Leadership.
